title: Vizhigalil Oru Vaanavil Lyrics Deivathirumagal Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Artist(s): Saindhavi 
Lyricist: Na. Muthukumar 
Movie: Deivathirumagal
Song: Vizhigalil Oru Vaanavil 
Music: GV Prakash

Vizhigalil Oru Vaanavil, Immaigalai thottu pesuthe
Idhu enna pudhu vaanilai, mazhai veyil tharum
Unnidam paarkiren naan parkiren En thaaimugam, anbe
Unnidam thorkiren naan thorkiren ennagumo, ingae
Mudhan mudhalaai mayangukiren
Kannadi pola thornrinai,
En munbu ennai kaatinaai
Kana engum vina ...

Vizhigalil Oru Vaanavil, Immaigalai thottu pesuthe
Idhu enna pudhu vaanilai, mazhai veyil tharum

Ne vandhaai en vazhvile,  Poo poothai en verile
Naalaye nee pogalaam, En niyabagam ne aagalaam
persendra pinnale meedhi ennagumo

Yaarivan yaarivan, or maayavan Meeyavanan anbil 
Yaarivan yaarivan, nan nesikkum Kanneer ivan nenjil
Inam puriyaa... unravidhu vo..
En theril poothat poovidhu, En nenjin vaasam poovadhu
Manam engum manam ....

Vizhigalil Oru Vaanavil, Immaigalai thottu pesuthe
Idhu enna pudhu vaanilai, mazhai veyil tharum

Naan unnakaaga pesinen, Yaar ennakaaga pesuvaar,
Mounam naan pesinen, Kaigalil mai poosinen
Ne vandha kanavenge kaatril kai veesinen
Anbenum thoondinai ne veesinai
Meenagiren anbe..
Un munbu thaanda ippodhu naan
pennaagiren ingae
Thayakangalal thinarukiren ..
Nil endru sonna podhilum 
Nillamal nenju oduthe, odhi undhan vazhi........
